author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces a module to perform fast conversion from `SiPixelQuality` payload to `SiPixelFEDChannelContainer` via direct query of the Database (without passing from Event Setup).
This speeds up significantly the workflow for creating conditions for so-called Stuck-TBM simulation.

#### PR validation:

This is a standalone module, and has been tested by running the example configuration file in 
`CondFormats/SiPixelObjects/test/FastSiPixelFEDChannelContainerFromQuality_cfg.py` 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport.
title: Introduce fast conversion of SIPixelQuality into SiPixelFEDChannelContainer payloads
